rows.label: qst104217_msg0001
rows.name:
Mih-hih-hih!
Power of science!

rows.label: qst104217_msg0002
rows.name:
Friends interested in research
of Kyukyu?

rows.label: qst104217_msg0003
rows.name:
Kyukyu experiment with ores and herbs
and things. Mash up, mix together, set
on fire. See what happen.

rows.label: qst104217_msg0004
rows.name:
Take large amount of intelligence.
Must measure smallest change in
quantities or procedure.

rows.label: qst104217_msg0005
rows.name:
Someday Kyukyu make shiny gold
or medicine for curing all illness or
something like that.

rows.label: qst104217_msg0006
rows.name: Kyukyu short on research funds though.

rows.label: qst104217_msg0007
rows.name:
Not even having research lab of own.
That why Kyukyu have to continue
research here.

rows.label: qst104217_msg0008
rows.name:
No research grant, so not enough
money to pay fee.

rows.label: qst104217_msg0009
rows.name:
Kyukyu want proper job using
intelligence and abilities to earn money!
Fund better research environment!

rows.label: qst104217_msg0010
rows.name:
Friends looking for science teacher
at Iyasaki Village?

rows.label: qst104217_msg0011
rows.name:
Kyukyu could do teaching in between
researching... But are friends sure?

rows.label: qst104217_msg0051
rows.name: Invite Kyukyu to teach in Iyasaki?

rows.label: qst104217_msg0052
rows.name: Invite

rows.label: qst104217_msg0053
rows.name: Think it over

rows.label: qst104217_msg0061
rows.name: All right! Kyukyu do teaching!

rows.label: qst104217_msg0062
rows.name:
Not much to take, so should not
take long to get ready!

rows.label: qst104217_msg0063
rows.name:
Oh, but Kyukyu not have moneys for
fast ship. Might take while to get there
taking cheap ships.

rows.label: qst104217_msg0081
rows.name:
Well, Kyukyu always ready
if friends make decision.

rows.label: qst104217_msg0101
rows.name:
Mih-hih-hih!
Power of science!

rows.label: qst104217_msg0102
rows.name:
Friends back to invite Kyukyu for
teacher again? Kyukyu could probably
fit teaching in between researching...

rows.label: qst104217_msg0151
rows.name:
Mih-hih-hih!
Power of science!

rows.label: qst104217_msg0152
rows.name:
Kyukyu run out of moneys for things
to burn in experiments. Need to find
proper job and earn moneys...

rows.label: qst104217_msg201
rows.name:
Kyukyu experiment with ores and herbs
and things. Mash up, mix together, set
on fire. See what happen.
